Translations.Text: They chose est cum the sedentary. Consequently their hearts sigillum sic they non comprehend
Prout pro messenger those believed eum they eagerly strive their moneta their vita. These deserved totus bonus things; they est winners
DEUS prepared them gardens flowing streams wherein they abide forever Hoc est major triumph

Arabs factus up excuses advenit vos seeking disponsationis stay behind Hoc est indicative de their rejection DEUS His messenger - they stay behind Indeed those disbelieve them incurred painful retribution
Non to blamed est those est infirmus male non invenit anything offer long prout they remain devoted to DEUS His messenger! righteous among them non blamed DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Alias excused est those advenit vos wishing included vos vos tell them ego non habet anything carry vos They tunc turn tears their eyes genuinely saddened they non afford contribute
blame est on those ask tuus disponsationis stay behind et they non habet excuse They chosen est cum the sedentary. Consequently DEUS sigillum their hearts sic they non attain any knowledge
